entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then partly cloudy. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:24 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:24 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
